overview:
Damian Voltes is the CEO of Patagonia Ventures (www.patagoniaventures.com) an Early Stage Venture Capital firm focused on Latin American markets.

He also is the CEO of Emerging Cast Inc. (www.emergingcast.com) an online media company focused on the professional creation of commercially valuable content at scale in Spanish, Portuguese and English.

He also is Partner-Latin America of GroupArgent (www.groupargent.com) a firm that provides both the corporate advisory services associated with investment banking activities as well as negotiated private equity investments in the securities of select client companies in the Data Economy sectors.

Previously, he founded Digital Ventures, Directa Networks & InZearch all online advertising companies acquired by FOX/News Corp in July 2007. During the post-acquisition period he served as VP of Global Business Development and Co-Managing Director.

Damian is also a serial entrepreneur. Since 1996, he is involved in the Internet/Online Media Industry. In the past, he founded several companies including: CuponesOnline.com Inc., Netkiosk S.A. and Inter-Marketing Group.

Damian also engages not for profit activities. For the past 3 years, he has been teaching ebusiness and entrepreneurship at the Universidad Argentina de la Empresa (UADE). He is a frequent speaker at several conferences around the world including Ad:Tech, IAA, IAB, Online Marketing Europe, ignite, OMD, Marketing 2.0, AMDIA and others). He also participates actively in several trade associations and is an active contributor at Fundacion Tzedaka.

Damian holds a Bachelor in Business Administration (Universidad de Belgrano), a MBA (Universidad de Belgrano) and a Postgraduate in Telecommunications (Universidad de San Andres & ITBA).

He is 38 years old, married since 2001 to Yamila and has 2 sons Federico (5) and Agustin (2)

In his spare time, Damian enjoys playing tennis, squash, skiing and blogging at www.damianvoltes.com
